sentences.en: A furious player kicked his racket into the grandstand.
sentences.cn: 一位愤怒的球员将他的球拍踢向了看台。

sentences.en: Can you loan me your tennis racket?
sentences.cn: 你能把网球拍借给我用一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had his tennis racket strung.
sentences.cn: 他将网球拍的弦装好了.

sentences.en: He makes such a racket I'm afraid he disturbs the neighbours.
sentences.cn: 他如此大声喧闹，我怕他打扰了邻居。

sentences.en: He was known for running a brutal extortion racket.
sentences.cn: 他因干过一起残忍的敲诈勒索而出名.

sentences.en: My dream was interrupted by the most awful racket coming through the walls.
sentences.cn: 我的睡梦被隔壁极为恼人的吵闹声给搅了。

sentences.en: Such a racket made me headache.
Suspicious fans exposed the racket and police arrested a man in Nottingham.
sentences.cn: 起了疑心的爱好者揭发了这一勾当，警察在诺丁汉逮捕了一名男子。

sentences.en: The ball rebounded from his racket into the net.
sentences.cn: 球从他的球拍上弹回网中.

sentences.en: The old machine used to make an awful racket .
sentences.cn: 这台旧机器以前噪音大得吓人。

sentences.en: The racket of drills and electric saws went on past midnight.
sentences.cn: 钻孔机和电锯的噪声过了半夜还继续响着。

sentences.en: They're involved in a drug - smuggling racket.
sentences.cn: 他们卷进了毒品走私买卖.

sentences.en: You need good hand - eye coordination to play racket sports.
sentences.cn: 网球之类的运动需要良好的手眼协调能力.

sentences.en: You need good hand-eye coordination to play racket sports .
sentences.cn: 网球之类的运动需要良好的手眼协调能力。

words.tran_cn: 喧扰的，喧闹的；不牢固的，摇晃的

trans.tran_cn: （网球等）球拍，〈美俚〉勒索金钱，讹诈，敲诈，骗局，（四周有围墙的）拍打回力网球，硬壁回力球，喧骚，吵闹，嚷闹，扰嚷，喧骚嘈杂的集会，狂欢
